Sophie Louise Ingle (amụrụ ya na abalị abụọ na onwa nke iteolu, na afo 1991) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Welsh na-agba bọọlụ FA WSL Chelsea ma bụrụ onye isi otu mba Wales
Ọ nọchitere anya Bristol Academy, Cardiff City na Liverpool na mbụ
Ingle na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na -agbachitere ma ọ bụ onye etiti
Na afọ 2020, a họpụtara goolu Chelsea ya megide Arsenal maka onyinye FIFA Puskas
Ingle bidoro ọrụ bọọlụ ya na otu ụmụ nwoke Vale Wanderers
N'agbanyeghị mkpesa na Football Association of Wales (FAW), iwu gbochiri Ingle ka ya na ụmụ nwoke ndị ahụ gafere ihe karịrị afọ 12
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ na football wee soro ụmụ agbọghọ Vale Wanderers na Dinas Powys Ladies nwee mkparịta ụka dị nkenke
Nke a bu ụzọ ịkwaga Ingle na-eto eto na Cardiff City Ladies
Mgbe oge dị na nchekwa, Ingle batara n'otu egwuregwu Premier League nke ụmụ nwanyị Cardiff n'oge oge 2007–08
Mgbe ya na Cardiff merichara iko Welsh ugboro abụọ, Ingle bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ maka WSL ekike Chelsea Ladies tupu mkpọsa 2012

Onye njikwa Chelsea Matt Beard wepụrụ Ingle dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti wee too mmetụta ya mgbe Chelsea meriri 2012 FA Women's Cup Final na Birmingham: "Sophie Ingle, anyị butere na mbụ dị ka azụ aka ekpe mana ị nwere ike ịhụ site na àgwà ya na bọọlụ na nkesa na Ịgụ egwuregwu ahụ dịkwa mma, o keere anyị ihe mgbaru ọsọ ole na ole na bọọlụ n'azụ nke ihe anyị na-enwebeghị mbụ."
Na February 2014, Ingle hapụrụ Chelsea ma kwaga nso n'ụlọ site na ịbanye na Bristol Academy
O biliri na onye isi The Vixens, mana agbahapụla klọb ahụ mgbe oge 2015 gasịrị
Ingle ghọrọ ebumnuche mbufe maka klọb ndị ọzọ wee kpebie ịbanye Liverpool na Disemba 2015: "Liverpool bụ nnukwu klọb na mgbe m matara mmasị ha, enwere naanị otu otu m chọrọ ịbanye"
Akpọrọ Ingle ka ọ nọchite anya Wales na ọkwa Under-17,  wee bilie bụrụ onye isi ndị otu Under-19
Ingle meriri okpu izizi mbụ ya maka Wales na 2–1 World Cup ntozu meriri Azerbaijan, nke emere na Baku na 28 Ọktoba 2009
Na Disemba 2011, akpọrọ Ingle na ndị otu GB izizi maka asọmpi Olympic 2012
Ọ meriri okpu 50th ya maka Wales na Julaị 2014, n'oge egwuregwu enyi na enyi ya na Scotland na Dumfries 1–1
Onye njikwa Wales Jayne Ludlow kpọrọ Ingle onye isi otu mba ọhụrụ n'ihu 2015 Istria Cup, nọchiri Jess Fishlock bụ onye a tụpụrụ n'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya na ndị otu ahụ
Na 22 Septemba 2020, Ingle gbara Wales egwuregwu 100 ya megide Norway n'oge asọmpi UEFA Women's Euro 2021
Na 27 Mee 2021, ekwuputara na ahọpụtara Ingle ka ọ bụrụ naanị onye ọkpụkpọ Welsh na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Great Britain maka asọmpi 2020
